comment: Welcome to the United States , Benjamin & Sara ! Joint Press Conference : <URL> <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Welcome to the United States , Benjamin & Sara ! Joint Press Conference : <URL> <URL>
(w / welcome-01
      :ARG0 (c / conference
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Joint"
                  :op2 "Press"
                  :op3 "Conference"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Benjamin"))
            :op2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Sara")))
      :ARG2 (c2 / country
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "United"
                  :op2 "States")))

comment: QUICK ! DEFLECT YOUR CONNECTIONS TO RUSSIA BY SHIFTING TO ISRAEL !
amr:
# ::snt QUICK ! DEFLECT YOUR CONNECTIONS TO RUSSIA BY SHIFTING TO ISRAEL !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (q / quICK)
      :snt2 (d / deflect-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / converse-01
                  :ARG0 y)
            :ARG2 (c2 / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "RUSSIA"))
            :manner (s / shift-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Israel")))))
